prompt: Please choose True or False for whether or not the following statement is accurate in describing how you have been feeling in the past weeks, including today: I look forward to the future with hope and enthusiasm

Please choose True or False for whether or not the following statement is accurate in describing how you have been feeling in the past weeks, including today: I can't imagine what my life would be like in 10 years.

Please choose True or False for whether or not the following statement is accurate in describing how you have been feeling in the past weeks, including today: I have enough time to accomplish the things I most want to do.
